name: Dentist Office Salon Party
description:
***Over 10 Million Downloads!*** Play The Original & Best Dentist Game! Have you ever wanted to become a dentist? Now you can with the Dentist Office Salon Party game!

Come help give a makeover! Featuring fun characters with 1,000's of scenarios to work on!

*INSTRUCTIONS*
1. Move the toothbrush back and forth to remove the yellow plaque (note: may take a few times to remove it all)
2. Use the yellow polishing tool to remove the brown tarter from the teeth (move it back and forth).
3. Use the green drill tool to remove the black spots on the teeth (move it back and forth).
4. Use the spray to remove the bad breath.
5. Use the blue brush tool to remove the green food pieces from in between the teeth.
6. Use the suction tool to remove the saliva from the mouth.
7. Dip the filling tool into the filling compound of your choice and paint it on the teeth.
8. Hold the braces tool over the desired braces for 3 seconds to pick it up and move to the tooth to place the brace piece.

Change backgrounds! Reset for a new scenario! Have fun!

*Please note that Dentist Office Salon Party is free to play, but you are able to purchase additional characters & remove ads with real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases.*

Ninjafish Studios is very concerned about our users' privacy. To understand our policies and obligations, please read our Terms Of Service and Privacy Policy carefully.

Terms Of Service: http://www.ninjafish.com/tos
Privacy Policy: http://www.ninjafish.com/privacy
